short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes minor tweaks to the Evernote web client to make it more usable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the note editing functionality on Evernote.com by resolving outstanding defects that have not yet been fixed. It does this by adding JavaScript listeners to the page when you edit notes on Evernote.com.

Currently, the only one issue is fixed.

- When you paste code with an empty line into an Evernote codeblock, empty lines are unexpectedly removed. This makes code in the codeblock less readable and may introduce unexpected errors. This extension ensures that empty lines remain visible and are saved in the note by adding appropriate metadata to the empty line.
